name: The Elipse
description:
"There is no going back, now, knight....."

                     "My soul was taken, and now yours shall be taken, too...."

                                            "You cannot break the Elipse, not even with Death on your side."

The Elipse is a suspenseful action RPG game and might even be a bit dark for some. You, the player, are a knight. You suspect that an Elipse exists in this world and you are trying to stop it. What is an Elipse? Well, it is up to you to put the pieces of the puzzle together.

Note: As this is my first game, honest reviews are appreciated. Thank you!
